title: Shoghicp也将参加GDC
author: iSteven
txt_content:
Shogicp: 我会因为在GDC会议之前得到一些出席者的名片而获得一个成就吗?
这也证实了Shoghicp会参加GDC。

原文:Do I get an achievement for getting some bussines cards from GDC attendees before the conference?

replies.author: HC20011015
replies.txt_content: Game Developers Conference,不知道此生能否亲自一看
